description: Portrait of a Lady was missing for 22 years until gardeners cleared ivy from a gallery wall.
title: Portrait of a Lady: Painting found in wall confirmed as stolen Klimt
title_page: Portrait of a Lady: Painting found in wall confirmed as stolen Klimt - BBC News
maintext: The frame of the painting was discarded on the roof of the building to make it appear that thieves had broken in through the skylight. That was not the case as the skylight was too small for the painting to fit through.
